value.string:
portal = context.getPortalObject()
 REQUEST = portal.REQUEST
 selection = portal.portal_selections.getSelectionFor(selection_name)
 listbox = portal.restrictedTraverse(listbox_path)
 
 REQUEST['PARENTS'][0] = context
 REQUEST.set('here', context)
 parameter_dict = selection.getParams()
 list_start = parameter_dict.get('list_start', 0)
 
 renderer = listbox.get_value('default', render_format='deferred_list')
 renderer.setSelectionName(selection_name)
 line_list = renderer.call_render(*renderer.positinal_argument_list, **renderer.named_argument_list)
 if list_start != 0:
 # remove header column for all pages except first one
 line_list = line_list[1:]
 total_pages = renderer.total_pages
 current_page = renderer.current_page + 1
 if total_pages != current_page:
 portal.portal_selections.nextPage(selection_name, [], list_start=list_start)
 context.activate(active_process=active_process_path,
 activity='SQLQueue',
 tag=selection_name).Base_storeListBoxPage(listbox_path,
 selection_name,
 active_process_path,
 skin_name,
 user_name,
 format)
 else:
 context.activate(after_tag=selection_name).Base_finaliseDeferredListBox(listbox_path,
 active_process_path,
 skin_name,
 'Base_sendReportByEmail',
 user_name, format)
 return line_list
listbox_path, selection_name, active_process_path, skin_name, user_name, format
